content.question: Write an essay in which that analyzes the rhetorical choices Price makes to develop her argument about United States culture.

frqParts.text: Write an essay in which that analyzes the rhetorical choices Price makes to develop her argument about United States culture.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
